sect1.title: count_sentences
sect1.para: This is used to count the number of sentences in a variable. A sentence being delimited by a dot, question- or exclamation-mark (.?!).

example.title: count_sentences
example.programlisting:
<?php

$smarty->assign('articleTitle',
                 'Two Soviet Ships Collide - One Dies.
                 Enraged Cow Injures Farmer with Axe.'
                 );

?>
example.screen: Two Soviet Ships Collide - One Dies. Enraged Cow Injures Farmer with Axe. 2

sect1.para: See also count_characters, count_paragraphs and count_words.
